localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Spend too much time in Zoom meetings that could be resolved asynchronously? Cut down on your meetings, and spend more time doing deep work with AsyncMeet.
blogPost.body: Spend too much time in Zoom meetings that could be resolved asynchronously? Cut down on your meetings, and spend more time doing deep work with AsyncMeet.
blogPost.title: Asynchronous Meetings - Make decisions without having meetings
blogPost.author: Ravi Beli

localize.description: 花在Zoom会议上的时间太多，可以异步解决？减少你的会议，用AsyncMeet花更多时间做深度工作。
localize.tagline: 不用开会就能做出决定

localize.description: 花在Zoom會議上的時間太多，可以異步解決？減少你的會議，用AsyncMeet花更多時間做深度工作。
localize.tagline: 不用開會就能做出決定

previous.excerpt: You know that no-code is great but not sure which tools to choose for your task? No-Code Stack will understand your idea and advise you on the best tools you can use for your project.
previous.title: No-Code Stack - Get your own no-code stack in a minute

localize.description: 你知道无码是伟大的，但不知道该选择哪种工具来完成你的任务？No-Code Stack将了解你的想法，并为你的项目提供最好的工具建议。
localize.tagline: 在一分钟内获得你自己的无代码堆栈。

localize.description: 你知道無碼是偉大的，但不知道該選擇哪種工具來完成你的任務？No-Code Stack將瞭解你的想法，併爲你的項目提供最好的工具建議。
localize.tagline: 在一分鐘內獲得你自己的無代碼堆棧。

next.excerpt: Share your images, not your secrets. Black Highlighter makes it easy to hide text you don’t want to share in images you’re going to share anyway. Hide people’s names, e-mail addresses, and more with just a quick scribble.
next.title: Black Highlighter - Share your images not your secrets

localize.description: 分享你的图像，而不是你的秘密。黑色荧光笔让你可以轻松地隐藏你不想分享的图片中的文字。只需快速涂鸦，就能隐藏人们的姓名、电子邮件地址等。
localize.tagline: 分享你的图像而不是你的秘密

localize.description: 分享你的圖像，而不是你的祕密。黑色熒光筆讓你可以輕鬆地隱藏你不想分享的圖片中的文字。只需快速塗鴉，就能隱藏人們的姓名、電子郵件地址等。
localize.tagline: 分享你的圖像而不是你的祕密
